meanings.definition: The act or process of forming theories.
meanings.sent1: Her theorizations about the stars were fascinating to listen to.
meanings.sent2: Scientists engage in theorizations to explain natural phenomena.
meanings.sent3: During the boring lecture, his mind wandered into wild theorizations about time travel.
meanings.sent4: Her theorizations were like colorful balloons floating in the sky of academia.
meanings.sent5: Theorizations are like seeds planted in the garden of knowledge, waiting to bloom.

meanings.sent1: The theorizations of the research led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent2: The book presented various theorizations on the origin of the universe.
meanings.sent3: His wild theorizations about aliens visiting Earth made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The theorizations of the great thinkers echo through the corridors of history.
meanings.sent5: The theorizations of the scientists were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
